snippet: Via video link, the Republican presidential candidate told Ukrainians at a conference that President Vladimir V. Putin of Russia felt free to invade Crimea and eastern Ukraine because he lacks respect for President Obama.
abstract: Republican presidential candidate Donald J Trump says Russia felt free to invade Crimea and eastern Ukraine because Pres Obama is weak and Russian Pres Vladimir Putin lacks respect for him.
lead_paragraph: Via video link, the Republican presidential candidate told Ukrainians at a conference that President Vladimir V. Putin of Russia felt free to invade Crimea and eastern Ukraine because he lacks respect for President Obama.

headline.main: Lack of Respect for Obama Emboldened Putin, Donald Trump Tells Ukrainians
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Europe; Ukraine: Trump Assesses a Crisis
